table Products = with
  [| as Product, as Color    , as Price |]
  [| "shirt"   , "white,grey", 10.50    |]
  [| "pants"   , "blue"      , 15.00    |]

Products.PriceCategory = if Products.Price < 5 then
                           "Cheap"
                         else if Products.Price < 12 then
                           "Fair"
                         else
                           "Expensive"

show table "Products" with
  Products.Color
  Products.Price
  Products.Product
  Products.PriceCategory
